name: Verify
author: FTTristan (fttristan#0000)
description: This cog allows server owners and admins to setup vrchat verification through VRCBand.
install_msg: Thanks for installing Verify! For a quick rundown on how to get started with this cog, check out [the readme](https://github.com/Fttristan/BunnyCogs/tree/master/verify/README.md)
end_user_data_statement: This cog does persistently store data or metadata about users.
